https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oNkUmRmlhM3RmGhLbqqje9v005c.jpg The film deals with the true events which happened in 1949 in Italy, when then schoolteacher Pier Paolo Pasolini was accused of having seduced three paesan boys. A World of Love
